title: Name to be displayed on the title bar and at the top of the page.
sources: Array of files where sources are defined.
scripts: Array of JavaScript files that will be loaded.
common: Common history of the family's origin.

common.text: A detailed description of the person's life history and marital status.

source.type: Citation type identifier (Integer). Valid values: 0 = Primary, 1 = Reference, 2 = Holy Text, 3 = Social Media.
source.uuid: Unique identifier (UUID) for the current citation.
source.text: The accompanying text that will be displayed with the citation.

common.isTable: This option determines whether the collector displays data as a table (1) or as plain text (0).

last_update: The time of the last file update, represented as Unix Epoch time.
authors: Names of the individuals who contributed to editing the text.
reviewers: Names of the individuals who reviewed the text.
documentsInfo: Additional information (remove this if not needed).
periodOfTime: A period of time (Middle Ages, Litic, Classic...)

maps.text: Description or information to be displayed alongside the map.
maps.img: File path to the map image.
maps.order: Number that specifies the position of the image on the screen.

prerequisites: List of prerequisites needed to understand the text.

families.name: Name displayed at the top of the page.

history.text: A detailed description of the person's life history and marital status.

source.type: Citation type identifier (Integer). Valid values: 0 = Primary, 1 = Reference, 2 = Holy Text, 3 = Social Media.
source.uuid: Unique identifier (UUID) for the current citation.
source.text: The accompanying text that will be displayed with the citation.

history.isTable: This option determines whether the collector displays data as a table (1) or as plain text (0).

history: A detailed description of the person's life history and marital status.

parents.father_family: Unique identifier for the father's family. It should match the family ID used here.
parents.mother_family: Unique identifier for the mother's family.

marriages.external_family_file: Boolean used to identify the file in which the family is listed.
marriages.name: Name of the spouse.

history.text: A detailed description of the person's life history and marital status.

source.type: Citation type identifier (Integer). Valid values: 0 = Primary, 1 = Reference, 2 = Holy Text, 3 = Social Media.
source.uuid: Unique identifier (UUID) for the current citation.
source.text: The accompanying text that will be displayed with the citation.

history.isTable: This option determines whether the collector displays data as a table (1) or as plain text (0).

history: A detailed description of the person's life history and marital status.

children.marriage_id: Unique identifier for the marriage (parental connection).
children.name: Name of the child.
children.family_id: Unique identifier for the child's family, used if the child establishes a new family.
children.external_family_file: Boolean used to identify the file in which the family is listed.

history.text: A detailed description of the person's life history and marital status.

source.type: Citation type identifier (Integer). Valid values: 0 = Primary, 1 = Reference, 2 = Holy Text, 3 = Social Media.
source.uuid: Unique identifier (UUID) for the current citation.
source.text: The accompanying text that will be displayed with the citation.

history.isTable: This option determines whether the collector displays data as a table (1) or as plain text (0).

history: A detailed description of the person's life history and marital status.
